page.description: Defines the indicator shown for a record in the List that has been added.

discussion.p: The *[ui:CSS - New record row indicator]* property is the CSS applied to a new record row in the List. Out of the box, the indicator shown is a blue triangle in the upper right-hand corner of the List row for the new record.
Leave blank to use the default CSS.
